name: Cactus Clicker
description:
*to download the game for free, click "No thanks, take me to downloads*

Grow your cactus and succulent empire in Cactus Clicker.  Choose from 4 succulents and cacti to start your journey with.  Create new structures and upgrade them to increase your production and increase your rank in the plant world.  In addition, the game features 35 different achievements as well as over 50 different fun facts about succulents and cacti.
